name: Form of a Legend
description:
Form of a Legend is a fantasy RTS game that will have new mechanics and civilizations. 

Gameplay
  • Play as the fantasy civilization of your choice.
  • Survival mode against hordes of enemies.
  • Procedural maps that will make each match different.
Planned Features
  • Adding more civilizations
  • Multiplayer
  • Card system Tech Tree
  • Religion System
  • Hero Units
  • More Win conditions
  • Tribes arround the map
  • Campaign/Coop Mode

If you want to keep us working on this project consider supporting us on Patreon
